name: Algal/Primary Production
functionStatement: Organic matter is captured and broken down, fueling food webs, balancing production/ respiration, moderating pH/ redox, and supplying nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Balanced algae/macrophyte growth, no nuisance blooms, unless moderate coverage is historically normal.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Chl-a grab sample or algal percent

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thick mats or scums widespread. Substrate obscured
Criteria: Dense blooms overshadowing habitat

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Frequent moderate mats in glides and pools
Criteria: Moderate nuisance mats that partially impair habitat

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Slight periphyton increase. Occasional filament clusters
Criteria: Slightly elevated algae

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thin biofilm with visible gravel and cobble. No mats
Criteria: Balanced growth and no nuisance bloom
